unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. private ledger
abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. was a New York corporation that was involved in the business of storage, wharfage, and warehousing, and owned property in Brooklyn. This collection includes one handwritten financial ledger.
collection_ssm: Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. private ledger
